AHq.caption: url
AHq.doc: Enter the full Daily URL for the room the user should join. If you don't have a URL yet, you can add one with the Daily - Create room action. The URL should be in the format https://your-daily-domain.daily.co/room-name
AHq.name: roomurl

AHr.caption: room style
AHr.doc: Choose the room style. Fullscreen will create a  video call that will occupy the entire screen. The bottom right will occupy the bottom right portion of the screen. The top right will occupy the top right portion of the screen. The custom position will occupy the space of a group you define (you will need to enter the id attribute of the group you'd like the call to display in). Audio-only will start an audio-only call (no video or interface will be created).
AHr.name: size

AHs.caption: meeting token
AHs.doc: Optionally enter a meeting token to configure the video session on a per-user basis. To create a meeting token, use the daily - create meeting token action.
AHs.name: token

AMV.caption: Use this action to join a Daily video or audio room and overlay Daily prebuilt in your app.
AMV.name: information

APU.caption: element ID
APU.doc: For a  video call in a custom position. If you'd like to render the call in a particular group, add the id attribute of the group here and choose "custom position" as the room style.
APU.name: element_id

APV.caption: active speaker mode
APV.doc: Specifies whether to start the Daily Prebuilt call in active speaker mode. Defaults to yes, but can be set to no to start the call in grid mode instead.
APV.name: active_speaker_mode

APX.caption: Customize theme colors for various parts of the video call UI. You can leave these colors as is or customize the values below.
APX.name: color_theme

APY.caption: To learn more about color theming, visit https://docs.daily.co/guides/customizing-daily-prebuilt-calls-with-color-themes
APY.name: colorlink

APZ.caption: accent
APZ.doc: Main theme color. Used for primary actions and keyboard focus.
APZ.name: accent

APd.caption: base text
APd.doc: Default text and icon color, as rendered on background or backgroundAccent.
APd.name: basetext

APe.caption: border
APe.doc: Default border color for bordered elements.
APe.name: border

APg.caption: main area background accent
APg.doc: Background color for the main call area.
APg.name: mainAreaBg

APi.caption: main area text
APi.doc: Text color for text rendered inside the call main area, e.g. names.
APi.name: mainareatext

APj.caption: supportive text
APj.doc: Text color for supportive, less emphasized, text.
APj.name: supportivetext

APk.caption: Enter the "id attribute" of a group and select "custom position" for the room style to render the call into a specific group.
APk.name: customcallinfo

APq.caption: leave button
APq.doc: Determines whether the leave button is visible
APq.name: showleavebutton

APr.caption: full screen button
APr.doc: Determines whether the full screen button is visible
APr.name: showfullscreenbutton

APs.caption: Customize the in-call UI by hiding and showing the leave or full-screen buttons or starting the call in active speaker or grid mode.
APs.name: interfaceinfo

AQR.caption: minimum tiles
AQR.doc: Specifies the minimum video tiles when the browser is resized when the call is in grid mode. The default and minimum required is 1
AQR.name: minimumTiles

AQS.caption: maximum tiles
AQS.doc: Specifies the maximum video tiles when the browser is resized when the call is grid mode. The default is 25 and the maximum allowed is 49.
AQS.name: maximumTiles
